sections.title: 1. Object and Scope of Application
content: These General Terms and Conditions (hereinafter "GTC") govern access to and use of the InteriMed digital platform (hereinafter "the Platform"), operated by InteriMed, headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland.
The Platform offers technological services aimed at:
• Facilitating connections between healthcare facilities (hereinafter "Facilities") and qualified healthcare professionals (hereinafter "Professionals").
• Providing a software solution (SaaS) for schedule, personnel, and compliance management.
By creating an account or accessing the Platform, the User (Facility or Professional) accepts these GTC without reservation.

sections.title: 2. Nature of Services and Role of InteriMed
content: 2.1. Technological Intermediary — InteriMed acts exclusively as a technical service provider and business introducer. InteriMed is neither a recruitment agency nor the employer of Professionals.
2.2. Staff Leasing — To ensure compliance with the Employment Services Act (LSE), the administrative and salary management of assignments is delegated to an authorized staff leasing partner.
Employment contract: Concluded exclusively between the Professional and the Staff Leasing Partner.
Service leasing: The Facility acts as the hiring company.

sections.title: 3. Access, Registration, and Data Accuracy
content: 3.1. Access Conditions — Access is reserved for Professionals authorized to practice in Switzerland and Facilities with a valid GLN/RCC number.

3.2. Data Accuracy — The User certifies that all information provided (Identity, Diplomas, Practice Rights, GLN) is accurate and up-to-date. InteriMed reserves the right to request supporting documents or suspend accounts in case of suspected fraud.
3.3. Beta Phase — During the launch phase, services are provided "as is". InteriMed does not guarantee continuous availability and is not responsible for minor bugs inherent to a testing phase.

sections.title: 4. Financial Conditions
content: 4.1. Pilot Phase — During the initial phase, use of the Platform may be free at InteriMed's discretion.
4.2. Pricing — InteriMed reserves the right to introduce subscription or connection fees. Users will be notified 30 days in advance of any pricing changes.
4.3. Referral Program — Credits or bonuses accumulated during the Pilot phase have no immediate monetary value and are subject to anti-fraud validation.

sections.title: 5. Non-Circumvention
content: 5.1. Prohibition of Direct Solicitation — Facilities are prohibited from directly engaging Professionals introduced via the Platform for 12 months following the last connection.
5.2. Penalty Clause — Violation of the non-circumvention clause may result in a fixed compensation equivalent to three (3) months of gross salary.

sections.title: 6. Liability and Warranties
content: 6.1. Limitation of Liability — InteriMed is not liable for the quality of work provided by Professionals, assignment cancellations, or payment defaults by the Staff Leasing Partner.
6.2. Verifications — While InteriMed performs digital verifications, the Facility remains responsible for final verification of a Professional's identity and practice rights.

sections.title: 7. Data Protection
content: 7.1. Hosting — Data is hosted exclusively on secure servers in Switzerland.
7.2. Legal Archiving — In compliance with Swiss law (Art. 958f CO), transaction and contract data will be retained for 10 years.

sections.title: 8. Intellectual Property
content: All elements of the Platform remain the exclusive property of InteriMed. Users are granted a personal, non-exclusive license to use the service.

sections.title: 9. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
content: These GTC are subject to Swiss Law. Exclusive jurisdiction is established at the competent courts of the Canton of Geneva.
